name: Magical Girl's Maze
description:
Welcome to the magic academy and meet Megumi, who dreamed of becoming the number one magical girl! But Oh no... To achieve her dream, she needed to pass a few tests by her Professor, and What's more, Creamy, Megumi's dearest companion and her best friend for life, became part of the Professor's test!

Only you can help Megumi to achieve her dream and, most importantly, reunite with her friends!

☆ Watch the game's complete gameplay played by our main character, Megumi! 

☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆

Theme:  Easy to play, hard to master.

Control:

Use left ← or right → button to navigate Megumi's magic.

Team : 

  1. VHS - Programmer, Game Designer, younger brother
  2. Hedi ABC - Illustrator, Creative Director, older sister

Credit :

4. FREE BGM "追いかけっこキャッハー" by Akito, link: https://dova-s.jp/EN/bgm/play6388.html
